title: What champions do you know how to fight against but still hate dealing with?
body: No, you're not allowed to say Satan {{champion:17}}

replies.body:
{{champion:55}} 

Every god-damn time the same story. I am up 20 cs in lane. She roams bot when I back and picks up a double kill. Ok, I'll play safe, no prob. Then she sees our jungler in her jungle and gets that kill too. Then she ults during the first dragon fight. 

Now she is up 5 kills and my team shouts "WTF dude how did she get so ahead!!??"

REALLY??

> [{quoted}](name=FarRockBF,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=X2pemA72,comment-id=0009,timestamp=2015-07-20T21:51:37.094+0000)
>
> {{champion:55}} 
> 
> Every god-damn time the same story. I am up 20 cs in lane. She roams bot when I back and picks up a double kill. Ok, I'll play safe, no prob. Then she sees our jungler in her jungle and gets that kill too. Then she ults during the first dragon fight. 
> 
> Now she is up 5 kills and my team shouts "WTF dude how did she get so ahead!!??"
> 
> REALLY??

You just took the words right out of my mouth. Doesn't matter how well you did against her in lane, she will come back with a vengeance.

Yeah, really irritating. 
You spam ping them to fall back and spam ping that kat is missing.... but they still stay in lane. Double kill... next time... same thing happens...

"WTF MID WHAT HAVE YOU DONE TO KAT" 

"OMG MID WHY DID YOU FEED KAT"

....

{{champion:16}} 

"It's okay we just need to kill Soraka first" ....................................................... UNDODGEABLE AOE SILENCE {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}

you clearly aren't

(•_•) ( •_•)>⌐■-■ (⌐■_■)

koalified

YEEEEEEEEEAAAAAAAAAHHHHHHHH!!!!
Sounds like you got a real problem with soraka
Don't worry, I'm a {{champion:40}} main.

Try {{champion:89}} . She absolutely demolishes Soraka because by the time Soraka gets out Equinox, you'll probably already have used everything, so silencing you will be pointless. That and Soraka can't peel you off her teammate, or get away from you if she's your target.

I guess I could E-W and queue up the Q in advance so she can't silence it :3
Trying this next time.
Except that there is that stupid half-second delay where the silence doesn't even register.

blitz. I could dodge 20 hooks but the one that catches just screws me over so hard.

Hook
okay, I can flash
Knock-up
okay now I can flash
Ult
okay MAYBE WITH THIS TINY SLIVER I CAN FL-
*An ally has been slain*

I've gotten to the point where I can dodge enough my flash will come up between times I do get hooked, but his entire kit is so retarded that you basically can't do anything post-6 if you do get hooked.

> [{quoted}](name=Junsui Aoi,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=X2pemA72,comment-id=0014,timestamp=2015-07-20T23:52:52.273+0000)
>
> blitz. I could dodge 20 hooks but the one that catches just screws me over so hard.
> 
> Hook
> okay, I can flash
> Knock-up
> okay now I can flash
> Ult
> okay MAYBE WITH THIS TINY SLIVER I CAN FL-
> *An ally has been slain*
> 
> I've gotten to the point where I can dodge enough my flash will come up between times I do get hooked, but his entire kit is so retarded that you basically can't do anything post-6 if you do get hooked.

I'm uncertain whether the blitz I tend to face are just bad or if there is really a point in which you can flash in between the hook and knockup, but I've reliably been able to flash instantly after being pulled in, but before he knocks me up.

it depends, I think if they activate it before the pull, they can basically just insta do it. I've flashed out before but eh. Its still not fun even if you know when to bully when hook is down and all that.
it more depends on the travel distance. At max range the stun wears off instantly and you have a half second to flash due to his slow attack speed/animation. At shorter ranges you can't

{{champion:92}} because in most matchups it just means you stay away from her, donßt give her an opening and survive till teamfighting starts. Just feels horrible to play against (except uif you play Quinn or Ali, but then you start pitying Riven at one point)
 {{champion:67}} because it doesn´t matter if you know how to play against her if she ever finds you alone later on (doesn´t even matter how far she is behind most of the times)
{{champion:429}} because sometimes i don´t want to pick a point&click hard cc

> [{quoted}](name=Don Eulrich,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=X2pemA72,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-07-20T21:49:31.246+0000) {{champion:429}} because sometimes i don´t want to pick a point&click hard cc

And then she continues to auto attack while CCed because of the bug with her passive.
{{champion:74}} Let me waste 3 times as much mana to kill a turret than it takes for you to place one down.

Add {{champion:23}} and {{champion:64}}  to that list.
Oh no! Assassins doing what they're designed to do! Whatever shall we do?

Assassins kit low health target's really fast

So why is it, no matter who the fuck you play as, 95% of the time both of these champions with fuck you and be really well off in the laning phase
Fun fact: 100% of self generated statistics and percentages are false.

{{champion:99}} & {{champion:35}} 

---
##Lux.
1. I don't care who you are, you spam your abilities. Don't lie to me. 
2. I have problems with her, as a bot. That should be saying something.
3. Her Q is obnoxious, as it goes through two targets. While her E is flat out annoying to deal with, it flies through the air then just sits there, she can detonate it to harass me or leave it there and I am slowed, then I get hit by it and I'm like ''Okay, cool. I had health once.''
4. The cooldown on her ult, for how much damage it does, is disgusting. 
5. That laugh. 
---
##Shaco.
1. Who needs {{champion:107}} ,{{champion:121}} or{{champion:29}} to steal Dragon or Baron, when you have **Shaco** who can blink and become invisible instantly?
2. Oh man, you juked the whole team.[ That must of been so hard to do.  ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jZXFYdd5jXc)
3. His ult is broken to me. It's not balanced, as 80% of Shacos that I've seen use their Ult as a decoy/bomb, unlike {{champion:7}} where he just doesn't care about it. Shaco can just throw his clone at you and if it detonates while you're low, well, tough luck.
What is the point of his ult anyways; if his ult lasted longer, but killing the clone kills him in the processes, then we would see a lot safer and healthier gameplay. Meepo from Dota2 (even though I know most of you don't want to read this) is hard to play because he splits into multiple people, which is balanced when you died with one, all of them die. That's how his clone should work. :/
Hurricane {{champion:55}}

{{champion:31}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:90}}

Guess which mechanic I hate facing. XD
SILENCE

I love how half of people posting in this thread didn't even read the goddamn OP.

{{champion:1}} Don't worry. I will still gib your team without counterplay.
{{champion:245}} You can push me out of the lane all you want, but you will never kill me.
{{champion:105}} Just fuck this abomination.
{{champion:55}} I'm 0/10 with 30 CS at 20 minute, but I will still score a penta in the next teamfight.
{{champion:92}} One mistake and you can go AFK.
{{champion:50}} I'm a great tactician hurr durr only point'n'click.

{{champion:67}} 
I understand how to deal wih her, but if she gets the jump on you and you are anywhere near terrain you are dead.
I hate the fact that I can't really get close to {{champion:74}} without risking an arm and a leg. (and my brother, {{champion:119}} 's body)

They are my most played champs, but damn I hate facing them in lane.

So done with this guy
Im sorry I can't hear you when my aids is pushing mid **WHILE IM AT TOP**

{{champion:23}} I can kill him 4/5 times, but that one time he has his ult up and barely lives, he gets so fucking ahead, and my team will have no idea how to kite or counter his split-pushing.
{{champion:24}} Same story, but it's even worse because you can't kite him while he's using his dodge and has his jump up.
{{champion:39}} There is no lead. She already overlapped you twice with her base kit.
{{champion:78}} Just let the one that's ulted kill her, and everyone else CC. This only works if she tries to 1v5, because otherwise you can't afford to focus her, so you basically have to sacrifice a teammate.
problem is {{champion:78}}  ults the tank then chases your carry

{{champion:92}} 

You are an AD version of Lux equipped with a B.F.Sword.
When you use your Q, I can farm, I can poke you, I can harass, I can do something.

But when a player knows how to cancel your animations...you destroy me, my morale, my soul.
You're boring to play and to have against. If a player doesn't know how to do bugs/glitches you are unplayble.

I hate everything about you.
{{champion:92}} {{champion:67}}{{champion:8}}
Just about any mid lane assassin. Even if you can do everything right, you can still get screwed over if your teammates don't know how to handle them.
